TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdlsBadOffsetException extends Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Store.Models.AdlsRemoteException

Docs.summary: A WebHDFS exception thrown indicating the append or read is from a bad offset. Thrown when a 400 error response code is returned for append and open operations (Bad request).
